TopicTitle: Part Tools crashing because of JSI and ASET? Help

Articles.Content:
Everytime i select a gamedata with JSI and ASET in it this happens:
[img]http://i.snag.gy/0BhxX.jpg[/img]

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

And if you notice the navball doesen't have textures....how do i fix that?

Sorry I didn't catch your mention of this in the ASET thread.

I'm not sure what is going on with Unity - I'm using 4.2.2 successfully, with ASET props and RPM. You might give that a try.

As for the navball - it appears that Unity 4.2.2 won't load DDS textures. I've had to set up a separate GameData directory with the props I use where I convert textures from DDS to TGA or PNG (since I don't run KSP from this directory, it doesn't matter which I use).
